articles.author: Melissa Rudy
articles.title: Breast cancer diagnoses spiking among women under 50, new report reveals - Fox News
articles.description: Although breast cancer deaths have been declining for decades in the U.S., diagnoses have been on the uptick among women 50 and younger, according to a new report from the American Cancer Society.
articles.content:
Although breast cancer deaths have been declining for decades in the U.S., diagnoses have been on the uptick among women 50 and younger.

articles.title: John Amos, actor in groundbreaking TV roles, dies at 84 - The Washington Post
articles.description: He played the stoic patriarch in “Good Times” and the adult Kunta Kinte in the miniseries “Roots.” He was also a fast-food entrepreneur in “Coming to America.”

articles.title: ‘Ring of fire’ solar eclipse to pass over part of United States, South America on Wednesday - KXAN.com
articles.description: On Oct. 2, an annular solar eclipse will pass over Hawaii, Easter Island, Chile and Argentina, with the best view of the “Ring of Fire” being on Easter Island.
